mapper.select: SELECT APPID, SUITID, SUITNAME, SUITTYPE, SUPERID,ISLEAF, REMARK,LEVELNO,ORDERID FROM dict_t_suit

SELECT APPID, SUITID, SUITNAME, SUITTYPE, SUPERID,ISLEAF, REMARK,LEVELNO,ORDERID FROM dict_t_suit
SUITID = #{suitid}
SELECT APPID, SUITID, SUITNAME, SUITTYPE, SUPERID,ISLEAF, REMARK,LEVELNO,ORDERID FROM dict_t_suit WHERE APPID = #{appID}

SELECT '${appID}' code, '0' id, (select appname from dict_t_appregister where appid='${appID}') name, '' type, '' pid, '0' isleaf, '' remark, 0 levelno, 0 orderid, 1 open from dual union all
SELECT SUITID code, SUITID id, SUITNAME name, SUITTYPE type, SUPERID pid, case when (select count(*) from dict_t_suit where superid=t.SUITID)>0 then '0' else '1' end isleaf, REMARK remark, LEVELNO levelno, ORDERID orderid, 1 open FROM dict_t_suit t WHERE APPID = '${appID}' ORDER BY ORDERID

select * from ( SELECT appid code, appid id, APPNAME name, '0' dealType, '' pid, '0' isleaf, 0 levelno, case when APPID='${appId}' then -1 else orderid end orderid, 0 open from dict_t_appregister union all SELECT SUITID , SUITID , SUITNAME , '0' , case when superid='0' then appid else SUPERID end, case when (select count(*) from dict_t_suit where superid=t.SUITID)>0 then '0' else '1' end isleaf, LEVELNO , ORDERID , 0 FROM dict_t_suit t union all select m.TABLEID, m.TABLEID, m.NAME, m.dealtype, m.SUITID , '1' , (select LEVELNO+1 FROM DICT_T_SUIT WHERE SUITID = M.SUITID) , m.ORDERID, 0 open FROM dict_t_model m where tabletype = '1' or tabletype = '3' ) CONNECT BY pid = PRIOR id START WITH LEVELNO = 0 order SIBLINGS BY ORDERID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P#DICT_T_SUIT (year, province, appid, suitid, suitname, suittype, superid, isleaf, remark, levelno, orderid, status, dbversion) select year, ${province}, appid, suitid, suitname, suittype, superid, isleaf, remark, levelno, orderid, status, dbversion from P#DICT_T_SUIT t where Year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and t.status='1' and t.PROVINCE=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('DIVID') and t.suitid not in(select s.suitid from P#DICT_T_SUIT s where s.year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and s.status='1' and s.province=#{province} )
